text: Rip Slyme is a Japanese hip hop group formed in 1994. It has 5 members - 4 MCs and 1 DJ. ==Albums== ===Indies albums=== *Lip's Rhyme (1995) *Talkin' Cheap (1998) ===Warner albums=== *Five (2001) *Tokyo Classic (2002) *Orchestra Plus (2003) - a recorded album completely of orchestra songs & poetry recitals from celebrities *Time To Go (2003) *Masterpiece (2004) *Epoch (2006) *FUNFAIR (2007) Category:Musical groups from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Hip hop bands
title: Rip Slyme
